    • input-output-basics

    input-output-basics

    input-output-basics.Rmd
    library(inputoutput)

    Common variables

    Let X be the input-output matrix and d the total final demand vector.

    M <- demand_matrix_12x12
aggregated_demands <- c("intermediate_total_demand","total_final_demand")
X <- M[ ,!colnames(M) %in% aggregated_demands]
d <- M[,"total_final_demand"]

    Leontief approach

    Input requirement matrix

    Let A be the direct coefficients matrix.

    A <- input_requirement_matrix(X, d)

    Leontief inverse matrix

    L <- leontief_inverse(A)

    Ghosh approach

    Output allocation matrix

    Let B be the output allocation matrix.

    B <- output_allocation_matrix(X, d)

    Ghosh inverse matrix

    G <- ghosh_inverse(A)
